description: Smallest prime p such that p+4^k is also prime for all k=1,..,n.
example: Prime 3 generates the {3,7,19,67} exponential prime-chain of length 4 if the start is also counted.The smallest "exponential 11-chain" starts with 13243063 as follows: 13243063,13243067,13243079,13243127,13243319,13244087,13247159,13259447,13308599,13505207,14291639.
prog: (PARI) okchain(n, p) = {for (k=1, n, if (! isprime(p + 4^k), return (0));); return (1);}a(n) = {p = 2; while (! okchain(n, p), p = nextprime(p+1)); p;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 17 2013
